name: Roopa Kanumuri
top_product: Invisalign,Dental implants, microscopic root canals, smile designing,
ideal_referral: NRIs seeking high-quality dental care in India • Patients with dental anxiety looking for pain-free treatments • Patients with previous bad dental experiences • Patients seeking minimally invasive, high-quality treatment • Individuals looking for smile makeovers
top_problem_solved: We fix teeth and trust issues,helping people who has past traumatic dental experiences . For example, a 24-year-old model came to me after a disastrous smile design treatment where multiple unnecessary root canals and crowns were done. The crowns were inappropriate material for front teeth , didn’t look natural, and had damaged her gum health. We removed them, used lasers to restore her gum health , and then gave her high-quality, restorations. She was thrilled with her new, natural smile and regained her confidence.
my_favourite_bni_story: I’m new to BNI and looking forward to my first success story maybe the next referral will be the one!!
